arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ
footnotes: Hapana nafsi ila inayo mlinzi wa kuiangalia na kudhibiti vitendo vyake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in kullu nafsin lammā ʿalayhā ḥāfiẓun
